 2010-16062010-12-09IC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Business Corporations Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Business Corporations Regulations, 2001
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA BUSINESS CORPORATIONS REGULATIONS, 2001 in response to changes being made to the generally accepted Canadian accounting principles by the Accounting Standards Board. As a result, public corporations will be required to prepare their financial statements in accordance with the International Financial Reporting Standards starting on January 1, 2011.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0305 Publication Date: 2010-12-22
